en.title: TikTok Giveaway
en.content:
@everyone Greetings, Chief!

To start the new year, we are launching a new giveaway over on our TikTok! Simply follow our TikTok now to receive a exclusive giveaway code!

ğŸ’Rewards:
ğŸThe code will contain: Oracle Soulstone*2, Blessed Soulstone*2, Speedup (3h)*2

ğŸ“… Event Duration: 1/9 - 2/1 (UTC)

ğŸ“Œ How to participate:
1. Tap the link below to follow our TikTok account
2. Tap the game controller icon on our TikTok profile page
3. Tap "Follower Gift" to claim your reward

Follow our TikTok here ğŸ‘‰ https://www.tiktok.com/@vikingrise 

ğŸ“œ Notes:
- This event requires the latest version of the TikTok mobile app and is not available on PC.
- Each code can only be used once.
- Each Chief ID can only use one code.

Hurry! Only 50,000 codes are available. Rewards are first-come, first-served!

en.title: Viking Rise TikTok Post
en.content: A humorous social media post from Viking Rise, depicting a scenario of tribe dynamics and promoting their official TikTok channel.

de.title:

**Viking Rise TikTok Post**

Level up dein Spiel mit diesem super Tipp! ğŸ”¥

Wenn du gegen Monster kÃ¤mpfst, nutze Helden mit Skills, die viel Schaden auf einmal machen (burst damage). Diese Strategie hilft dir, sie schneller zu besiegen und mehr HP fÃ¼r deine nÃ¤chsten KÃ¤mpfe zu sparen. ğŸ›¡ï¸

de.content:
Okay, here's a German translation for a humorous social media post from Viking Rise, depicting tribe dynamics and promoting their TikTok channel, keeping game terms/codes in English.

---

**Viking Rise â€“ Offizieller Post**

**Titelidee:** Das Tribe-Leben in einer Nussschale ğŸ¥œğŸ˜‚

**Text:**

Wenn du versuchst, eine Strategie fÃ¼r den nÃ¤chsten Raid zu planen, aber dein Tribe-Chat so aussieht:

*   **Member 1:** "AFK, muss dringend mein Pet fÃ¼ttern!"
*   **Member 2:** "Kann mir jemand 500k Wood schicken? Ist fÃ¼r ein superwichtiges Secret Project!"
*   **Leader:** *schickt ein Meme von einer Katze, die ein Base-Camp angreift*
*   **Du:** ğŸ¤¦â€â™€ï¸ "Ist das euer Ernst?!"

Willkommen im Alltag eines Tribe-Leaders! Oder einfach nur im Tribe-Leben...

FÃ¼r mehr chaotische Tribe-Momente, epische Fails und exklusive Einblicke â€“ schaut auf unserem offiziellen **Viking Rise TikTok**-Kanal vorbei!

[Link zu eurem TikTok-Kanal hier]

#VikingRise #TribeLife #GamingHumor #TikTokGaming #RaidPlan #AFK #MemeTime #StrategyFail

---

**Explanation of choices:**

*   **Titelidee:** "The Tribe Life in a Nutshell" â€“ a common idiom, translated naturally.
*   **"Wenn du versuchst, eine Strategie fÃ¼r den nÃ¤chsten Raid zu planen..."**: "When you're trying to plan a strategy for the next raid..." â€“ common German phrasing for this situation.
*   **"aber dein Tribe-Chat so aussieht:"**: "...but your tribe chat looks like this:" â€“ natural introduction to the bullet points.
*   **Game terms kept English**: "Raid", "AFK", "Pet", "Wood", "Secret Project", "Leader", "Meme", "Base-Camp", "Tribe", "Tribe-Chat", "Tribe-Leader", "Viking Rise", "TikTok".
*   **Humorous dialogue/situations**: The specific excuses and the leader sending a meme create the humor.
*   **"Ist das euer Ernst?!"**: "Are you serious?!" â€“ A common, slightly exasperated German phrase.
*   **"Willkommen im Alltag eines Tribe-Leaders! Oder einfach nur im Tribe-Leben..."**: "Welcome to the daily life of a Tribe Leader! Or just to Tribe life..." â€“ A good summary line.
*   **Call to Action**: Clear and direct, using "schaut vorbei" (check us out / drop by).
*   **Hashtags**: Mix of English (game/internet specific) and German (descriptive).

cn.title:
Since you haven't provided the specific text for the "Viking Rise TikTok Post," I'll give you a template and examples of how to translate common elements, ensuring game terms/codes remain English.

**General Rules Applied:**
*   **Game Name:** "Viking Rise" remains English.
*   **Specific Game Units/Roles/Features:** (e.g., Hero, Jarl, Alliance, Event, PvP, Raid, Skills, Gear, Lords) will remain English.
*   **Codes/Promotions:** (e.g., Redeem Code, Gift Code) will remain English.
*   **General Instructions/Marketing Language:** Will be translated to Chinese.
*   **Hashtags:** Often translated for reach, but if the brand uses English hashtags primarily, keep them. I'll provide both options.

---

**Example Template and Phrases:**

**(Scenario: Announcing a New Update/Event/Hero)**

**Original English (Example):**

"Hey Vikings! ğŸ”¥ A new update has landed in Viking Rise! Get ready to meet our new Hero, 'Ragnar the Fierce,' and dive into the 'Winter Solstice Event' for exclusive rewards! Don't miss out on the epic PvP battles and claim your legendary Gear. Use code 'VRTIKTOK' for a special gift! Download Viking Rise now and build your empire!
#VikingRise #MobileGame #StrategyGame #NewUpdate #Gaming"

---

**Explanation of terms kept English:**

*   **Viking Rise:** Game title
*   **PvP battles:** Specific game mode/feature
*   **Kingdom building:** Core gameplay mechanic
*   **welcome pack:** Common game bundle/gift term
*   **code `VIKING2024`:** The promotional code itself
*   **in-game Rewards:** Specific game items/bonuses
*   **Link in bio:** Common TikTok/social media phrase for navigation
*   **Hashtags:** Often kept as is for discoverability and platform consistency (`#VikingRise`, `#MobileGame`, `#Strategy`, `#NewEvent`, `#GuildWars`)

If you have a specific text you'd like translated, please provide it!
ru.content:
To provide the most accurate translation, I need the *specific English text* you want translated.

However, I can provide an example based on your description, keeping game terms/codes in English as requested.

**Let's assume the English text you want to translate is something like this:**

"That moment when your *tribe* finally agrees on the *KvK* strategy, but then one member is like 'Wait, can we just attack that *farm* instead? It looks juicy!' ğŸ˜‚

Sound familiar? For more *Viking Rise* laughs and epic *tribe* moments, check out our official TikTok!

---

en.title: Viking Rise 10 Billion Resource Giveaway Event
en.content: Participate in an exciting event to share a prize pool of 10,000,000,000 random resources (Food or Lumber). Follow simple steps to claim your share.

en.title: New Era: Dragon Crystal Power
en.content: The wise Vikings discovered the immense power contained within Dragon Crystal. Dragon Crystal Buildings can now reach higher level caps, and new Dragon Crystal Technologies await discovery by Viking warriors. The tribe enters a new era of Eternal Brilliance.

en.title: Holiday Goodies and Exclusive Promo Code
en.content: The Viking Rise team announces new holiday content, including the Snow Realm Deer Decor Item and new Hero Skins for Margit (Enchanted Snowy Night) and Bjorn (Holiday Carols). Additionally, players can claim the special promo code VRXMAS2025 as a thank you for the memories made this year. Be sure to claim the code before its expiry on January 15th, 2026.
